chanuka rathwaththe athulu hayakata adhichodana | dinamina niwasa chanuka rathwaththe athulu hayakata adhichodana shri lanka maha bankuwe anumathiyakin thorawa mulya samagamak pihituwa pawathwagena yama sambandhawa chanuka rathwaththe mahatha athulu withthikaruwan hayadenakuta erehiwa kolambaa mahadhikarana winisuru wikum kaluaarachchi mahatha idiriye eeye (22) adhichodana pathra bharadena ladi. 2015 janawari 01 wanida ha 2015 okthobar masa 30 wanida athara kalayedi nisi awasarayakin thorawa entrast limitad namathi samagama pihituwa pawathwagena yamen danduwam labiya haki waradi sidukara athi bawata nithipathiwaraya wisin withthikaruwanata erehiwa adhichodana nanga atha.
